column2: I want to mention how happy I was with the atmosphere of this restaurant. Most restaurants blast the air conditioning even when it's not needed. The temperature was cool and pleasant
column3: not frigid. The place was busy when we arrived
column4: but we were seated right away. The staff works hard to keep things moving along. Our food arrived quickly (within about 10 minutes) and was very tasty. I ordered the veggie burger and the patty had nice
column5: big chunks of vegetables in it.
